features: 🏆𝐅𝐀𝐒𝐓 & 𝐏𝐎𝐖𝐄𝐑𝐅𝐔𝐋 𝐇𝐎𝐓 𝐒𝐓𝐄𝐀𝐌: 1200 watts, rapid heating in 3-5 minutes, and emits powerful pressurized hot steam at 230°F for up to 7-15 minutes!

🏆𝐍𝐀𝐓𝐔𝐑𝐀𝐋 & 𝐒𝐀𝐅𝐄: Steam Cleaner for Home 100% natural, with no harmful smoke or residues. Equipped with a safety lock and cap on the handle for added peace of mind. It can be used confidently around children and pets.

🏆𝐖𝐇𝐎𝐋𝐄 𝐇𝐎𝐔𝐒𝐄 𝐂𝐋𝐄𝐀𝐍𝐈𝐍𝐆: STEAMIFY handheld steam cleaner is a versatile and fully equipped cleaning tool that meets your daily household cleaning for harmful fumes or residue. This steamer for cleaning excels at reaching challenging spots, corners, and angles. From kitchen sinks, BBQ grills, toilets, and shower curtains to floors, kids' toys, pet mattresses, cars, sofas, and clothing, our versatile steam cleaner for home ensures a thorough and efficient clean every time.

🏆𝐏𝐎𝐑𝐓𝐀𝐁𝐋𝐄 𝐂𝐎𝐌𝐏𝐀𝐂𝐓 𝐀𝐍𝐃 𝐄𝐅𝐅𝐈𝐂𝐈𝐄𝐍𝐓:Our Handheld Pressurized Steam Cleaner for cleaning and efficiency! With its compact design, easily tackle tasks at home, in offices, garages, and more. The 9.8-ft power cord ensures versatility, and its lightweight design makes it a convenient steamer for cleaning in every room.

🏆𝐏𝐎𝐖𝐄𝐑𝐅𝐔𝐋 𝐁𝐎𝐈𝐋𝐄𝐑: STEAMIFY Steamer cleaning has a 1200W power, 350ML water tank (280ML water capacity is recommended to leave some space for normal use). It heats up in 3-5 minutes, runs continuously for over 7-15 minutes, and releases high-pressure steam at 230°F for effective cleaning.

🏆𝐏𝐎𝐖𝐄𝐑𝐅𝐔𝐋 𝐀𝐂𝐂𝐄𝐒𝐒𝐎𝐑𝐈𝐄𝐒: Our portable steam cleaner, complete with a 10-piece accessory set, is the ultimate steamer for cleaning and ironing. This comprehensive kit includes essentials like an angled nozzle, bendable extension, brush nozzle, fabric steamer tool, rubber wiper for windows/doors, and more. With these accessories, our all-in-one steamer guarantees exceptional results, making it the perfect steamer for cleaning every corner of your home.

🏆𝐓𝐈𝐏𝐒: If you are unable to open the safety lid after use, please wait a few minutes before trying again. Only open the safety lid when the device is powered off and the internal steam has cooled to prevent burns.

What is the highest temperature this steam cleaner can reach? Our steam cleaner is designed for safe and effective cleaning with an internal temperature of 230°F (110°C) and steam between 212°F and 221°F (100-105°C). Cleaning at this optimal temperature ensures both stain removal and personal safety. Why can't I open the safety cap if I want to refill it after use? Because there is high pressure in the water tank. It is recommended to cool down for 3-5 minutes after use and open the safety cap after the pressure in the tank has been released, and only after that can the tank be refilled with water. How effective is a steamer for cleaning grout and tile? It works well for grout and tile. The attachment comes with 2 nylon brush heads that are perfect for cleaning a variety of crevices. What is included inside the package? If you look at the pictures and description, you'll know that it includes the steamer along with 10 attachments for cleaning, and it helps with all-around home cleaning. Who do I call if my steam engine doesn't work? You can contact their after sales email :𝐬𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭@𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐚𝐦𝐢𝐟𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐞.𝐜𝐨𝐦 address, usually it's in the box or manual, they will tell you what to do, very professional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Title: "A Cleaning Powerhouse! STEAMIFY Handheld Steam Cleaner - Fast, Safe, and Efficient!"
reviews.reviewText: I am thrilled with the STEAMIFY Handheld Steam Cleaner! This powerhouse of a cleaning tool has exceeded my expectations in every way. From its rapid heating capabilities to the wide range of surfaces it tackles, here's why I give it a resounding five stars:🌟 Fast & Powerful Steam: The 1200 watts of power ensure rapid heating in just 3-5 minutes, emitting pressurized hot steam at an impressive 230°F. This means I can get to cleaning in no time, with a powerful steam flow that lasts between 7-15 minutes.🌟 Natural & Safe: The 100% natural steam produced by this cleaner ensures a safe and residue-free cleaning experience. Equipped with a safety lock and cap, I can confidently use it around my children and pets without worrying about harmful smoke or residues.🌟 Whole House Cleaning: The STEAMIFY Handheld Steam Cleaner is a versatile and fully equipped cleaning tool. From challenging spots and corners to various surfaces like kitchen sinks, BBQ grills, toilets, floors, and even clothing, this steamer excels in providing a thorough and efficient clean every time.🌟 Portable & Efficient: With its compact design and a 9.8-ft power cord, this handheld steam cleaner is a powerhouse that easily tackles tasks in every room. The lightweight design makes it convenient for use in homes, offices, garages, and more.🌟 Powerful Accessories: The 1200W power and 350ML water tank, along with the 10-piece accessory set, make this steamer a complete cleaning and ironing solution. From angled nozzles to fabric steamer tools, every accessory ensures exceptional results, making it the perfect steamer for cleaning every corner of my home.🌟 Safety Tips Included: The inclusion of safety tips in the product description is a thoughtful touch. It provides clear instructions on post-use precautions, ensuring a safe and burn-free experience.In conclusion, the STEAMIFY Handheld Steam Cleaner has become an indispensable tool in my cleaning arsenal. Fast, safe, and efficient, it's a must-have for anyone seeking a reliable and powerful steam cleaner. I highly recommend it to fellow cleanliness enthusiasts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you’re wondering if this steam cleaner is worth it, read on…
reviews.reviewText: I bought this steam cleaner in hopes it would be helpful in removing years worth of grease/crud build up off of my gas stove metal grates. Mind you, this was after multiple attempts to clean it with other methods that usually work, such as soaking the grates in hot water & whatever cleaning agent followed by a good sesh of hard scrubbing with wire brushes.Although that method worked a bit, the result was always the same.Some of the grease build up would come off but that sticky, gross crud resembling the remnants of adhesive would hang on for dear life and I’d be sitting there feeling like I just wasted hours of my day I’d never get back.Well I’ll be damned! This steam cleaner has been a life saver!!! It’s easy to use AND works like a charm. I went from hand scrubbing all sorts of kitchen items which took me hours to steam cleaning everything within minutes. So yes, WORTH EVERY PENNY!!!With that being said, there are a few things to keep in mind:1)READ THE USER MANUAL BEFORE USING IT.2)Definitely use the water filling cup it comes with to fill the water chamber, rather than just placing it underneath the faucet and hoping it’s got enough water in there. The cup is provided for a reason :)3) It needs time to heat up prior to using it and time to cool down before refilling the water chamber, so plan accordingly.4) Wearing some sort of gloves would be a good idea so your hands don’t get covered in gunk. No you don’t need heavy duty gloves, but a pair of household rubber gloves one would use to wash dishes with will do.5) If you’re using this to clean heavy build up of some sort, wear clothing you don’t care about incase there’s any unforeseen splattering. The steam cleaner itself doesn’t create a massive amount of splatter, but, odds are there will be a bit of splattering when cleaning.Hope this review was helpful :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Hands-On Review of the STEAMIFY Pressurized Handheld Steam Cleaner: A Household Hero
reviews.reviewText: My experience with the STEAMIFY Pressurized Handheld Steam Cleaner was nothing short of impressive. As someone who takes pride in maintaining a clean home, this steamer has become an indispensable tool in my cleaning routine.Let me start by highlighting its versatility. With 10pcs accessories and a safety lock, this little powerhouse can tackle just about any cleaning task thrown its way. From grimy bathroom tiles to greasy kitchen surfaces, the STEAMIFY Steam Cleaner handled them all with ease. The variety of attachments made switching between tasks a breeze.What really stood out to me was the safety lock feature. As a parent, knowing that the steamer won’t accidentally turn on when my kids are around is a huge relief. Plus, the ergonomic design made it comfortable to hold, even during longer cleaning sessions.In terms of performance, the STEAMIFY Steam Cleaner didn’t disappoint. It blasted away dirt and grime with its powerful steam, leaving surfaces sparkling clean and sanitized. I was especially impressed by its ability to reach into tight spots and crevices that other cleaners often miss.The quick heating time and continuous steam function meant I could keep cleaning without any interruptions. However, I did find myself refilling the water reservoir more often than I’d like for larger projects. And while the power cord could be longer for added convenience, it wasn’t a dealbreaker for me.Overall, the STEAMIFY Pressurized Handheld Steam Cleaner has earned its place as a household hero in my book. Its versatility, performance, and safety features make it a must-have for anyone who takes their cleaning seriously. I can confidently say that my experience with the STEAMIFY Steam Cleaner has been nothing short of fantastic, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable cleaning solution.
